snippet: Michael Shannon recalls being fired from one of his first big jobs.
abstract: Michael Shannon recalls being fired from one of his first big jobs.
lead_paragraph: The Bagger has already introduced you to the cuddly Michael Shannon, and over the weekend, the protean star of "Take Shelter" spoke with the equally cuddly David Carr about his career, from Steppenwolf Theater in Chicago to being directed by Martin Scorsese in "Boardwalk Empire."
